name: When someone calls my favorite character stupid (btw my favorite character is sonic the hedgehog)
name_original: When someone calls my favorite character stupid (btw my favorite character is sonic the hedgehog)
description:
When someone calls my favorite character stupid (btw my favorite character is sonic the hedgehog) is a game developed by Fadeaway. It was originally released in 2021.
When someone calls my favorite character stupid (btw my favorite character is sonic the hedgehog) is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
